name: Cloudflared
short_description: Cloudflare Tunnel for secure remote access without exposing ports.
description: Cloudflare Tunnel for secure remote access without exposing ports. Cloudflared is a self-hosted application focused on network, security, vpn, privacy. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Cloudflared on your home server to cloudflare tunnel for secure remote access without exposing ports without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Cloudflared to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
